title: Vaping’s Bad Publicity Hasn’t Cut Into Sales
text:
E-cigarettes may have attracted a lot of negative attention lately, but that hasn’t hurt sales yet, according to new research from Cowen & Co.

The back story. There’s been no shortage of scary news coverage about the potential dangers of vaping, and recent high-profile cases have renewed calls for stricter regulation of e-cigarette products. That said, vaping remains a major source of future growth for the tobacco industry, along with other so-called reduced-risk products that are looking to convert current smokers.
